document.full_text: police answering cries for help on friday found a screaming burglar dangling from a ceiling air vent over a hot fat fryer at an upstate new york restaurant.
document.title: burglar feels the heat dangling over hot oil vat
lines_and_colors: police answering cries for help on friday found a screaming burglar dangling from a ceiling air vent over a hot fat fryer at an upstate new york restaurant.
